<h3 id="X9957">X(9957)&nbsp;=&nbsp;ORTHOLOGIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: HUTSON INTOUCH TO AYME</h3>
Trilinears &nbsp;&nbsp; (b+c)*(a^2-(b-c)^2)-6*a*b*c  :  :  <p><b>
X(9957) = (2*R-r)*X(1)+r*X(3)
</b></p>
<p>
The reciprocal orthologic center of these triangles is X(10).</p>
<p>X(9957) lies on these lines: {1,3}, {2,3885}, {4,7320}, {5,7743}, {8,392}, {10,496}, {11,9956}, {12,9955}, {37,4266}, {72,145}, {78,4917}, {210,3632}, {221,1480}, {355,497}, {376,4308}, {381,9578}, {382,9580}, {390,944}, {495,946}, {515,9856}, {518,3244}, {519,960}, {550,4311}, {551,3812}, {758,3635}, {912,1483}, {936,2136}, {943,1320}, {950,952}, {956,5250}, {962,1056}, {995,4646}, {997,3913}, {1005,3957}, {1064,5399}, {1100,5053}, {1125,1387}, {1149,4642}, {1210,5690}, {1317,2771}, {1365,6018}, {1389,2346}, {1479,5252}, {1490,7966}, {1497,5398}, {1621,4861}, {1699,9654}, {1770,5434}, {1788,3654}, {1829,4222}, {1870,1902}, {2262,3247}, {2292,2611}, {3061,3991}, {3085,5886}, {3241,3555}, {3294,4875}, {3476,4294}, {3485,3656}, {3486,5887}, {3600,6361}, {3616,3753}, {3621,3876}, {3622,5439}, {3623,3868}, {3624,3698}, {3625,4662}, {3626,3740}, {3633,5692}, {3636,3742}, {3655,4305}, {3679,3893}, {3680,7160}, {3683,5258}, {3811,5289}, {3820,6736}, {3825,5123}, {3870,5730}, {3871,5440}, {3873,4018}, {3892,4084}, {3895,5687}, {3899,3962}, {3921,4678}, {3927,6762}, {3940,6765}, {3956,4746}, {3983,4668}, {4015,4701}, {4059,7278}, {4187,6735}, {4251,6603}, {4314,5882}, {4345,5703}, {4640,8666}, {4673,5295}, {4719,4868}, {4853,9708}, {5011,9327}, {5195,7247}, {5274,5818}, {5587,9669}, {5603,5806}, {5691,9668}, {5728,5766}, {5790,9581}, {5881,9947}, {7992,9845}, {8099,8241}, {8100,8242}, {8583,9709}</p>
<p>
X(9957) = midpoint of X(i),X(j) for these {i,j}: {1,3057}, {65,5697}, {72,145}, {3244,3878}, {3555,3869}<br>
X(9957) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (8,5044), (65,5045), (942,1), (960,3884), (3625,4662), (3754,3636), (4701,4015), (5836,1125), (5881,9947), (6797,1387)<br>
X(9957) = X(20)-of-incircle-circles-triangle<br>
X(9957) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1,35,1319), (1,40,999), (1,46,3304), (1,55,1385), (1,57,7373), (1,65,5045), (1,942,5049), (1,1697,3), (1,3612,1388), (1,3746,2646), (1,5119,56), (1,5697,65), (1,7962,1482), (1,7991,3333), (1,9819,40), (8,392,5044), (8,1058,5722), (8,3890,392), (55,1388,3612), (56,3579,5122), (56,5119,3579), (65,3057,5697), (65,5045,942), (145,3877,72), (1000,1058,8), (1388,3612,1385), (1482,6767,1), (3241,3869,3555), (3636,3754,3742), (4015,4701,4711), (9578,9614,381), (9580,9613,382)<br>
</p>
